activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12897
activity.text:
Hi @Jacobjeevan I would like to work on this issue.
Implementation Plan: 
Locate the line where `t("change_avatar_note")` is used.
- Replace it with a hardcoded message like: 
  Only JPG and PNG images up to {maxSize}MB are allowed.
- Ensure dynamic maxSize is preserved from `careConfig.imageUploadMaxSizeInMB`.
